org.apache.karaf.system.management

Interface SystemMBean

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    SystemMBeanImpl

    public interface SystemMBean
    Describe the system MBean.

      • getProperties

        java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> getProperties(boolean unset,
                                                               boolean dumpToFile)
                                                        throws javax.management.MBeanException
        Get all system properties.
        Parameters:
        unset - if true, display the OSGi properties even if they are not defined (with "undef" value).
        dumpToFile - if true, dump the properties into a file in the data folder.
        Returns:
        the list of system properties.
        Throws:
        javax.management.MBeanException - If a failure occurs.

      • getProperty

        java.lang.String getProperty(java.lang.String key)
        Get the value of a given system property.
        Parameters:
        key - the system property key.
        Returns:
        the system property value.

      • setProperty

        void setProperty(java.lang.String key,
                 java.lang.String value,
                 boolean persistent)
        Set the value of a system property.
        Parameters:
        key - the system property key.
        value - the new system property value.
        persistent - if true, persist the new value to the etc/system.properties file.
